title: Install PhpWebStudy
text1: 1. Use brew to install, the application is already on brew cask, you can use brew to install directly, brew install phpwebstudy
text2_1: 2. You can also download the latest version of PhpWebStudy from the download page
text3: 3. Double click to open the DMG file, drag the application to the Applications folder to complete the installation
text4: 4. If you cannot install and are prompted with "Your security preferences only allow apps from APP STORE and approved developers to be installed", please click Still open to continue installation in System Preferences-> Security and Privacy
text5: 5. If you want to stop this pop-up in the future, you can set Trust Any Source in System Preferences -> Security & Privacy
text6_1: 6. If there is no source option in Security and Privacy, you can refer to this document for settings
